prompt: B. Specific Gender Policy objectives Specifically, the policy aims to: (1) Strengthen the gender mainstreaming and accountability across national sector policies, planning frameworks and strategies in public and private sector: Gushimangira iyubahirizwa ry’ ihame ry’uburinganire no kubazwa ibyo abantu bakora mu gushyira mu bikorwa ihame ry’uburinganire muri za politiki na gahunda by’inzego zose binyuze mu igenamigambi n’ingamba mu nzego za leta n’iz’abikorera (2) Ensure equal access and control of productive resources and economic opportunities for women and men, boys and girls: Guharanira ko abagabo n’abagore bagira uburenganzira n’amahirwe angana yo kugera, gukoresha no gufata icyemezo ku mutungo mu rwego rwo kwiteza imbere; (3) Improve gender equality in education, health and social protection: Kunoza ihame ry’ uburinganire mu burezi, ubuzima no muri gahunda zose zigamije imibereho myiza y’Abanyarwanda; (4) Identify, map and address persistent cultural norms, gender stereotypes, and imbalances affecting the principles of gender equality and equity between women and men and girls and boys: Kugaragaza ibyiza biri mu muco w’u Rwanda no kubyubakiraho mu guteza imbere uburinganire no kuziba icyuho giterwa n’ imyumvire isubiza inyuma ihame ry’uburinganire hagati yabagabo n’abagore, abahungu n’abakobwa; (5) Ensure effective boys and men’s engagement programs and strategies in gender promotion: Guharanira ko uruhare rw’abagabo n’abahungu rugaragara mu guteza imbere ihame ry’uburinganire (6) Strengthen the mechanisms for promoting women’s participation in leadership and decision-making positions: Gushimangira uruhare rw’ abagore mu nzego z’ubuyobozi no mu myanya ifata ibyemezo; (7) Increase knowledge on gender equality and equity in public and private sectors as well as among citizens in general: Kongerera ubumenyi n’ubushobozi inzego za Leta, Abikorera, amashuri makuru na za kaminuza, imiryango itari iya leta, imiryango ishingiye ku myemerere no mu baturage muri rusange ku bijyanye no guteza imbere ihame ry’uburinganire (8) Guarantee a conducive legal, policy, and institutional arrangement for the promotion of gender equality and equity: Gukomeza gushyiraho no kuvurura politiki n’amategeko mu rwego rwo kurushaho guteza imbere uburinganire hagati y’abagabo n’abagore, abahungu n’abakobwa. Guiding Principles - Gender equality is about women and men or girls and boys:Uburinganire bw’abagabo n’abagore, abahungu n’abakobwa - The cross-cutting nature of gender should not compromise its relevance across sectors: Uburinganire bugomba kwitabwaho no kugira agaciro mu nzego zose n’ahantu hose - Gender equality is not only a social issue and human right principle but also an important approach for country’s transformation and sustainable development: Uburinganire ntabwo ari ikibazo cy’imibereho n’imibanire y’abantu gusa ahubwo ni ihame ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu; ni n’inzira y’ingenzi mu kwihutisha iterambere rirambye ry’Igihugu, abantu bose bagizemo uruhare. - Women’s empowerment is seen both a social and economic capital for national development programs: Guha ubushobozi abagore bigaragara nk’igishoro cy’imibereho myiza n’ Iterambere mu bukungu muri gahunda zose z’Igihugu. - Political Will:Ubushake bwa Politiki Examples of gender stereotyping: - Emotional characteristics: women should be inferior, submissive, quiet, and humble, putting things in order, being clean while men should be very tough, active, dominant, and self-confident. Women are excessively emotional, while men are more logical. - Behaviors in the households: Women cook food and clean the house, and they are better at childcare; while men are good at repairing things, they cannot and shouldn’t know how to cook food, tailor and care for children. - Profession: on one hand, women are fit to teach, be nurses or secretaries, and occupy library management positions, and they are not fit for politics. On the other hand, men are fit for handyman work such as mechanics, masonry, plumbing, engineering, and they are great politicians. - Physical appearance: women should be skinny, short, soft, and modest, while men should be tall, fit, and ‘masculine. THE ROLE OF GENDER EQUALITY IN THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE COUNTRY Gender Equality in the improvement of the social welfare The principle of Gender equality is the source of development such as the: - Participation in government programmes that support gender equality - Avoiding conflict and other forms of violence - Having a balanced die - Equal access to community health insurance - Maternity leave - Family planning(Men should stop the mentality of thinking that family planning is only the women’s duty) - Parental care and positive parenting - Allocation of home duties to both female and male children(Children should be trained to do all work together, in accordance to their means and abilities) - Equal opportunities to study sciences and vocational trainings (In schools, boys and girls should be taught the same things, given the same opportunities, and assisted to study in the same manner) The role of Gender in Economic Development - Collaboration and complementarity in home duties - Women in business and other profitable works than domestic work The role of Gender Equality in Good Governance - It has enabled women to join government decision making organs, cooperative movements leadership, parastatal bodies, legal institutions, security agencies, and many other organs. - Currently, all females and males are allowed to attend school, and learn different professions and business activities - In the public sector, women participate in campaigns and get elected in the institutions. - All of men and women should participate in Government programmes, to help them grasp the importance of having a role in all the decisions taken, where no one is put aside. Such programmes include; Family Evenings (UWI), Friends of the Family (IZU), Health Workers, mediators, community work, solidarity committees etc. The role of men and boys in the promotion of Gender Equality: Men were, and often still are, characterised by their conduct, belief in superiority, toxic masculinity, societal views of their responsibilities, way of life, and behaviour There are some behaviours of men that undermined gender equality. These include: • To believe that what’s he is doing, is being done as a man; • Thinking that him alone is in charge, especially in decision-making; • To believe that he can have sex whenever he wants, without consent; • To believe that he has the rights to marry many women, or have concubines; • To think that violating the rights of her wife is not a crime, it is disciplining; Steps to change and changing other men The following are steps to become a changed man: • To adopt individual behaviour change • To be a good example to your family and friends; • To be a good example to your neighbours and to teach them good behaviour, complementarity and collaboration in their families • To carry out advocacy in all possible places so that men with backwardness become conscient and accept to change. Characteristics of a changed man There are behaviours and habits that characterise a changed man and contribute to gender equality and family promotion. Those behaviours are the following: • To love and respect your wife; • To share advice in the home and not make decisions alone • To forward ideas in a constructive and developmental manner; • Abstain from adultery and polygamy; • To ask and have consent before and during sexual intercourse; • To make decisions agreed upon by members of the family; • To avoid violence against your partner, other family members and outsiders. The role of women and girls in promoting of gender equality Behaviours and habits that should characterize a changed woman, in the role of wife, who can contribute to gender equality and family promotion, include: • To love her husband; • To consult and seek different opinions in order to make decisions together • To share ideas in a constructive and developmental manner; • Abstain from adultery and polygamy; • To ask and have consent before and during sexual intercourse; • To make decisions agreed upon by members of the family; • To avoid violence against the husband, other family members and outsiders.

Follow these steps to prepare a budget: 
 
Step 1: Record all sources of income in a given time period. 
 
Step 2: Create a list of expenses for a given time period. 
 
Step 3: Subtract expenses from income. 
 
Step 4: Review the budget. 
 
Step 5: Make adjustments.

Ingingo yihitirwa 1: Kwimakaza uburinganire mu igenamigambi, politiki z’inzego, ingamba kimwe na gahunda n’imigambi mubikorwa bya leta n'iby’abikorera 
Ingingo yihutirwa ya 2: Kwihutisha iterambere ry'abagore mu bukungu 
Ingingo yihutirwa ya 3: Kunoza gahunda y’ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’uburinganire n’amahame y’uburinganire mu burezi, ubuzima no kurengera imibereho

language:
Gahunda zitandukanye Igihugu cyiyemeje kugenderaho mu ruhando
mpuzamahanga, harimo:
prompt:
- Gahunda ya HeForShe yo muri 2015ikubiyemo gushishikariza abagabo n’abahungu guteza imbere uburinganire no gushyigikira abagore n’abakobwa mu iterambere ryabo by’umwihariko gukuraho imbogamizi zose zituma batagaragaza ubushobozi bifitemo. 
 
- Politiki y’uburinganire y’Umuryango w’Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Gahunda 2063 y’Umuryango w’Afurika yunze Ubumwe yemejwe mu 2015 iteganya ko Afurika yo mu 2063 izaba ifite uburinganire bwuzuye, aho abagore bazaba bafite nibura 50% by’imyanya itorerwa mu nzego za Leta ndetse na kimwe cya kabiri cy’imyanya y'ubuyobozi mu nzego za Leta n’izabikorera. 
 
- Politiki y’uburinganire ya COMESA5 yibanda ku kwimakaza ihame ry’uburinganire hagati y’aabagabo n’ abagore, abahungu n’abakobwa mu bikorwa byayo byose byo mu karere hagamijwe ko abagabo n’abagore bitabira kandi bagakungurirwa kugira uruhare rungana mu iteremabere ry’Akarere. 
 
- Politiki y’Uburinganire y’Umuryango wa Afurika \Yunze Ubumwe (2009) ishimangira ubuvugizi hagamijwe guteza imbere buringanire no kubahiriza uburenganzira bwa muntu, iterambere ry’umugore by’umwihariko kumwongerera ubushobozi ku rwego mpuzamahanga, urwa Afurika, Akarere, n’ibihugu bigize Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe. 
 
- Gahunda y’uruhare rw’Abagore mu kubungabunga amahoro n’umutekano, Umwanzuro wa 1325 w’Akanama k’Umuryango w’Abibumbye gashinzwe umutekano ku isi (UNSCR 1325) ujyanye n’uruhare rw’abagore mu kubungabunga amahoro n’umutekano wemejwe mu 2000, ugaragaza ko abagore bagira uruhare rukomeye mu gukumira, gucunga no gukemura amakimbirane, kubaka amahoro ndetse n’inzira y’ubwiyunge nka bamwe mu bagerwaho n’ingaruka z’umutekano muke n’amakimbirane. 
 
Kubera izo mpamvu, iyi politiki isaba kwinjiza ihame ry’uburinganire mu nzego zose zifata 
ibyemezo no kurandura ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina ry’uburyo bwose no mu nzego zose. 
 
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu byashyize mu bikorwa uyu mwanzuro wa 1325 binyuze muri gahunda zitandukanye zirimo iteganyabikorwa ry’Igihugu(NAP) mu mwaka, gahunda y'igenabikorwa by'Igihugu (National Action Plans -NAP). Mu mwaka wa 2009, u Rwanda rwakoze iteganyabikorwa ry’imyaka itatu (2009-2012) ryo gushyira mu bikorwa umwanzuro wavuzwe hejuru. Muri Werurwe 2019, hatangijwe ku mugaragaro iteganyabikorwa ry’Igihugu icyiciro cya kabiri (2018-2022) mu rwego rwo gushimangira uruhare rw’abagore rwagaragajwe n’ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’iteganyabikorwa ryabanje. 
 
- Icyerekezo 2030 cy’Intego z’Iterambere Rirambye (SDGs) zigamije guteza imbere abagore n’abakobwa, guhabwa uburenganzira n’amahirwe angana ku isi hose kugira ngo abagore n’abakobwa babeho nta hohoterwa n’ivangura bibakorerwa. Uburinganire, iterambere ry’'umugore no ku mwongerera ubushobozi ni imwe mu ntego 17 z'iterambere rirambye, ariko kandi igomba kwinjizwa mu zindi gahunda zose z'iterambere rirambye

1.3. Impamvu yo kuvugurura politiki y’uburinganire 
 

Ivugururwa rya Politiki y’Igihugu y’Uburinganire ya 2010 rishingiye ku mpamvu enye z’ingenzi: 
 
Ivugururwa rya Politiki y’Igihugu y’Uburinganire ya 2010 rishingiye ku mpamvu enye z’ingenzi: Iya mbere: nubwo Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yateye intambwe igaragara mu guteza imbere uburinganire hagati y’ abagabo n’abagore, kandi hagashyirwaho ingamba mu kwigisha uburinganire no gushyiraho amategeko n’inzego bihamye bigamije kubuteza imbere, haracyakenewe imbaraga nyinshi kugira ngo ihame ry’ uburinganire ryubahirizwe kandi ryumvikane kurushaho mu byiciro byose by’Abanyarwanda. 
 
Ubumenyi budahagije mu kwinjiza uburinganire mu nzego zitandukanye bikomeje kugaragara nk’imbogamizi ituma igenamigambi n’ishyirwamubikorwa rya gahunda zitandukanye zidasubiza uko bikwiye, ibibazo bibangamiye abagabo n’abagore, abahungu n’abakobwa. Imyumvire mibi n’imigirire ifitanye isano n’umuco udaha agaciro abagabo cyangwa abagore bidindiza iterambere ry’uburinganire. Na none kandi, kuva hashyirwaho politiki y’Igihugu y’uburinganire ya 2010, byagaragaye ko hagikenewe kubaka uburyo bunoze bwo kubazwa ibyo abantu bakora mu guteza imbere uburinganire. Kubera ibyo bibazo hamwe n’ibindi bikomeje kugaragara bigenda bivuka, bisaba ko hashyirwaho politiki nshya n’ingamba nshya. 
 
Icya kabiri, umwaka w'ingengo y'imari wa 2018/2019 ni umwaka wa kabiri wo gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda ya Guverinoma y’imyaka irindwi Gahunda yo kwihutisha iterambere (NST1, 2017-2024), ihuza icyerekezo 2020 na 2050. Ibyifuzo by'ingenzi by'icyerekezo 2050 bigamije kuzamura imibereho y’Abanyarwanda ku rwego rwo hejuru. Kubera iyo mpamvu, Politiki y’igihugu y’uburinganire yavuguruwe mu rwego rwo kugaragaza uruhare rw’uburinganire mu biteganijwe mu Cyerekezo cy’Igihugu 2050. 
 
Icya gatatu: Politiki y’Igihugu y’uburinganire ivuguruye igamije gushimangira ibyo u Rwanda 
rwiyemeje kugeraho mu ruhando mpuzamahanga no kubishyira mu bikorwa. Muri byo, harimo: 
 
- Amasezerano yerekeye kurwanya ihohoterwa iryo ari ryo ryose rikorerwa umugore (CEDAW), 
- Itangazo ry’ Inama Mpuzamahanga ya kane yabereye i Beijing na gahunda yayo y’ibikorwa(1995), 
- Amasezerano yashyiriweho umukono i Maputo y’inyongera ku masezerano y’uburenganzira bwa muntu n’ubw’abaturage bushimangira uburenganzira bw’abagore muri Afurika (2003), 
- Itangazo ku buringanire muri Afurika (2004), 
- Politiki y’uburinganire mu Muryango waAfurika y'Iburasirazuba, Politiki y’uburinganire muri COMESA, 
- Politiki y’uburinganire mu Muryango wa Afurika yunze Ubumwe, 
- Intego z’Iterambere Rirambye (SDGs), 
- gahunda 2063 y’Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’Afurika hamwe n’imihigo ya HeForShe (2015) n'ibindi. 
 
Icya kane:uretse mu nzego za Leta, kwinjiza ihame ry’uburinganire mu nzego z’abikorera ntibyashyizwemo imbaraga muri politiki yabanje, bityo hakaba hakenewe gahunda mpinduramatwara mu kwimakaza ihame ry’uburinganire mu nzego z’abikorera. 
 
Uruhare rw’abagabo n’abahungu mu guteza imbere uburinganire ruracyari ruto bitewe n’uko nta ngamba zihariye zo gutuma abagabo n’abahungu bagira uruhare rugaragara mu bikorwa biteza imbere uburinganire. Bityo byagaragaye ko hari igikwiye gukorwa mu gushishikariza abagabo n’abahungu gushyigikira uburinganire n’iterambere ry’ubagore. 
 
Kubera izo mpamvu, iyi politiki yubakiye ku byagezweho na politiki ya yibanjirije, ikaba iteganya ibikorwa byo kuziba ibyuho byagaragajwe ndetse nibikomeje kugaragara mu rugendo rwo kwimakaza ihame ry’ uburinganire mu Rwanda.
